description: Surrounded by nature’s tranquility and lush greenery, this 3-level townhouse blends generous space with timeless comfort. The main floor welcomes you with updated flooring, a cozy family room, and an open living and dining area that extends to a sunny SE-facing balcony—perfect for summer BBQs. Upstairs, the vaulted primary suite offers complete privacy with a spacious walk-in closet and ensuite, while two additional bedrooms share a well-designed full bathroom—ideal for family living. The adaptable lower level invites you to create your vision: a dream theatre, workout studio, library, or family fun zone. This flexible space is ready to evolve with your lifestyle. Set in a quiet neighbourhood just steps from golf, trails, and parks, yet minutes from schools, shopping, and dining. Call now!
